content.question: This graph presents evidence for which of the following statements?

choices.label: If an identical twin develops schizophrenia, their sibling will also have schizophrenia.
There is a genetic predisposition for developing schizophrenia.
Genes do not play a role in the development of schizophrenia.
Identical and fraternal twins have the same statistical risk of developing schizophrenia.

content.answer: There is a genetic predisposition for developing schizophrenia.

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 3.A: Identify psychology-related concepts in descriptions or representations of data.
